agents.note: Working on US-041: Create simulator status display

agents.name: Agent2
agents.note: Completed US-042: Add simulated VIN decoding. Implemented SimulatedVinDecoder class with profile-based decoding, database caching, StaticDataCollector integration. 35 tests passing.

agents.name: Agent3
agents.note: Completed US-043: Create simulator CLI commands. Implemented SimulatorCli class with keyboard commands (p=pause/resume, f=inject failure, c=clear failures, s=status, h=help, q=quit). Non-blocking input via background thread. 44 tests passing.
